text: Charles George Patrick Shaughnessy, 5th Baron Shaughnessy (born 9 February 1955) is a British actor. Shaughnessy is known for his roles on American television, as Shane Donovan on the soap opera Days of Our Lives, as Maxwell Sheffield on the sitcom The Nanny, and as the voice of Dennis the Goldfish on Stanley. He was born in London. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:English voice actors Category:Actors from London
title: Charles Shaughnessy
